attributes.action: Offer a reasonable pay rise to NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff have provided incredibly good service over the past year, often at considerable personal cost.  They deserve to be properly rewarded for this.
attributes.background: Offer a reasonable pay rise to NHS staff.  This should be at least 1% more than the latest annual increase in the CPI.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
